alert.note: Alert for Halifax; Pittsylvania (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Stokes, Rockingham, Caswell, southwestern Pittsylvania and southwestern Halifax Counties and the southeastern City of Danville through 615 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oregon Hill, or near Mayfield, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Danville... Eden... Reidsville... Wentworth... Madison... Yanceyville... and Bethel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
